data.title: Daniel C. West, MD
data.meta_description: Daniel C. West, MD, is an attending physician with the the Division of Hematology and Associate Chair for Education with the Department of Pediatrics at Children's Hospital of Philadelphia. He holds the Stephen Ludwig Endowed Chair in Medical Education.
